Title: Bekikang: Ang nanay kong beki
Writer: Wenn V. Deramas (story), Wenn V. Deramas (screenplay)
Actors: Joey Paras, Tom Rodriguez, Tirso Cruz III, Lassy
Plot: Bekikang is left and abandoned with a baby boy by friend, Fortunato. He loves and raises the child as his own flesh and blood. When things are going so well between Bekikang and the child, ...
